relevant_findings.general: Lying in bed, no apparent distress, moving all extremities.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no rales, rhonchi, or wheezes.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft abdomen with diffuse epigastric pain on palpation, most tender in the right upper quadrant. Elicited pain but no inspiratory arrest. No rebound or guarding. Bowel sounds present.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time, moving all extremities.
relevant_findings.extremities: Dorsalis pedis pulse present, warm, well-perfused.
